attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We live in a country that has seen fit to reward this fat, ugly, stupid, disgusting object for doing nothing other than being fat, ugly and stupid and therefore a ROLE MODEL for Britain's less enlightened teenage girls, making Vicky Pollard look like a class act.
This situation is obviously very damaging to the future well-being of the country and needs to be resolved as soon as possible.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
